item.title: Bloomberg Interview Info
item.description: Hi redacted, It was great speaking with you today! If you have any follow up questions, please let me know. My goal is to ensure you have the best process possible. Below, I have included the next steps, so please read these carefully. I look forward to working with you and best of luck on the interview process! Next Steps: Apply to the role here Please list the referral source as “Bloomberg Recruiter - redacted” and let me know once you’ve submitted your application

item.title: Onboarding
item.description: 1.1 Mission Elon Society for Computing strives to connect, support, and serve Elon students that are passionate about computer science. We are committed to continuously learn, innovate, and serve our community. 1.2 Values Commitment We are dedicated to ESC’s mission and projects. Members will regularly attend club/team meetings, deliver quality work, and consistently meet target deadlines. We embody professionalism to produce our best quality work. Inclusion ESC is open to any student interested in Computer Science and willing to learn, work, and challenge themselves.
